$schema.description: The thing that gives you this description

search_paths.description: Paths where to search for music

recursive_search.description: if true, the directories will be searched recursively

library_path.description: Absolute path to the json file with the library. If null, uamp will not save or load the library.

player_path.description: Absolute path to the json file with the playback info. If null, uamp will not save or load the playback.

audio_extensions.description: File extensions that are checked as music

update_library_on_start.description: when true, uamp will search for new songs every time on start

remove_missing_on_start.description: when true, uamp will remove songs from library that have invalid path when loading new songs

register_global_hotkeys.description: When true uamp will try to register global hotkeys (they don't properly work with wayland)

volume_jump.description: specifies how much the volume should change with heach volume up/down

save_playback_pos.description: When playback position is saved, it can be loaded the next time uamp starts. This means that your song will continue playing at the same place that it was when you closed uamp.

save_timeout.description: When not null, saves all the data every number of seconds specified here

fade_play_pause.description: Sets the fade play/pause. Set to 0 to disable fading.

global_hotkeys.description: Maps global hotkeys to their action.

additionalProperties.description: Defines what a global shortcut will do. It can by any of the CLI instance actions separated by whitespace.

tick_length.description: Determines how often is the seek bar refreshed, in seconds

seek_jump.description: Determines how much should be seeked with fast-forward/rewind

server_address.description: Address of the server to register and use.

delete_logs_after.description: Logs are deleted after this time

enable_server.description: If true, server will be enabled. If the server is disabled, you cannot control running instance from CLI

gui_state_path.description: Path to json file containing the gui state. When null, gui state is not saved or load.

shuffle_current.description: When false, if you shuffle the playlist, the current playling song will be first.

show_help.description: When true, you will see help in the settings when you hover over something.

previous_timeout.description: When not null, the action for previous will go to previous only if the last previous action was in the given time, otherwise it will rewind to start

show_remaining_time.description: When enabled, the time to the right of the seek slider will show the remaining time instead of total time.

play_on_start.description: When enabled, uamp will start playing when it starts.

simple_sorting.description: By default, when you sort songs in the library, they are also sorted by additional properties. Enable this to change that behaviour
